def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_tiny_black = is_small(x, ctx) and is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_larger_grey = is_large(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_above_x = is_above(y, x, ctx)
        check_z_lone_black = all([not all_close([x,y,z,dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot not in [x,y,z]]) and is_dark(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_tiny_black
            and check_y_larger_grey
            and check_y_above_x
            and check_z_lone_black
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    return state
state = select(state)
